Title: Reunited, Once Again
Description:
That should be enough. I can sense the others just on the outside of the grove, ready to enter the Dream.

When you're ready, speak to me and I will break the ice walls and bring down the dome. I hope that my changes will not dishearten the flight. 

We will not be done, but we will be all together again.
ObjectivesText: Speak with Ysera to lower the barrier.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak to Merithra in Ancient Bough.
